title: bhagavAn narasimha
sahitya:
bhagavAn narasimha bhAratiyai jnAna vAridhiyaip-paNivOm jagatguru


anupallavi

  aham parabrahma sAkSAtkAram aDainda vEdAnta siddhan arivuk-kaDal avan anbai en sholluvEn


caraNam    nava navamAgiya kavi pozhiyum koNDal nAda vEdak-kalai nAlum arindavan 
kaviyOgi bhArati enrennai vAzhttiya karuNaip-perumAn avan aruNa mukha vilAsan
